content:
Book a minimum of 15 rooms for 2 nights & let us reward you with 5 ways to say thank you!

  • One Complimentary Night Stay Per 30 Room Nights Booked
  • One Premium Upgrade with Bottle of Wine for a Guest of your Choice
  • $50.00 Gift Certificate to our Seven Stills Bar/Restaurant
  • $75.00 Amazon Gift Card
  • $15.00 Lyft Credits 

BOOK BY AUGUST 31ST AND ACTUALIZE BY DECEMBER 31ST 

OFFER NOT VALID ON EXISTING CONTRACTS, BLACKOUT DATES MAY APPLY

Phone: 415.989.3500

E-mail: sales@stanfordcourt.com
